sub_title: Business Lead ChromeOS - Benelux at Google
summary: Several years of global up- and downstream marketing, brand and product management experience with focus on consumer and technology. Expert in fast go-to market processes with strong skills in business development, stakeholder and endorser management. Pragmatic business sense and creative mindset in (digital) product management and leading multiple discipline teams across world wide locations.
